title: Capanema
extract:
Capanema is an agricultural town in Pará. Nothing much for tourists here, but you might get stuck on your way to or from Salinópolis.


Get in
Situated on the main highway Belém - Fortaleza, there are quite a few buses passing by in either direction. The main bus station is about 2 km from the center, while a smaller one, Terminalzinho, is right on the edge of the commercial district. Last bus to Salinópolis around 4PM.


Get around


See


Do


Buy
Many shops along the main street, Barão de Capanema.


Eat


Drink


Sleep
 Hotel Central, Barão de Capanema (Right by the Terminalzinho). Has a namesake with the same owner somewhat down the street. Single R$30-35.
